approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

changeController.description: Changes the controller of the contract.

createCloneToken.description: Creates a new clone token with specified parameters.

generateTokens.description: Generates new tokens and assigns them to the specified address.

destroyTokens.description: Destroys a specified amount of tokens from the caller’s account.

approveAndCall.description: Approves a spender and calls a contract with the additional data.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

creationBlock.description: Returns the block number at which the contract was created.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation.

balanceOfAt.description: Returns the balance of an account at a specific block number.

version.description: Returns the version of the contract.

parentToken.description: Returns the address of the parent token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupplyAt.description: Returns the total supply of tokens at a specific block number.

parentSnapShotBlock.description: Returns the snapshot block of the parent token.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that the spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

tokenFactory.description: Returns the address of the token factory.

controller.description: Returns the address of the controller.

NewCloneToken.description: Triggered when a new clone token is created.

Approval.description: Triggered when approval is granted to a spender.

ControlTransferred.description: Triggered when control is transferred to a new controller.

constructor.description: Constructor for initializing the contract with the token factory and initial owner.
